definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

sentences.english: Making magic in the movie in my old Chevrolet.
sentences.chinese: 在我的老式雪佛萊汽車裏演繹着銀幕上的奇蹟。

sentences.english: A model poses with a Chevrolet at an auto show in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 雪佛萊的車模在北京汽車展上擺出造型。

sentences.english: Well. I'd like to take a look at it. It's a 1978 Corvette. Right.
sentences.chinese: 我是想看爬坡，是一輛1978年的雪佛萊。對嗎？
